document_data.name: Deliah
document_data.mainbody:
'''Deliah the White''' was one of the [[Masked Lord]]s of [[Waterdeep]] that served her city for a time during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|What are those dangers? Knowing of these dangers does us little good unless we also know what they are.|Deliah, telepathically communicating to Open Lord Piergeiron.}}
document_data.Personality: She was a thoughtful individual that wished to gain more information before passing judgement while serving the office.
document_data.Possessions: Like her fellow Lords, Deliah wore the full ''[[Lord's ensemble]]'' while carrying out official duties.
document_data.History: Deliah held the title of Masked Lord during the {{YearlinkName|1371}}. She joined council with Open Lord [[Piergeiron the Paladinson|Piergeiron]] and seven of their fellow Lords of Waterdeep, along with leaders from [[Evermeet]], [[Evereska]], and Prince [[Aglarel Tanthul]] of [[Thultanthar]] that year as the threat of the [[phaerimm]] grew to endanger all of [[the North]]. Tensions rose quickly between the Shadovar prince and the other councilors, but Deliah kept her calm and attempted to guide conversation towards meaningful resolution.
